verses.name: 2 Samuel 1:1
verses.text: Now it came to pass after the death of Saul, when David was returned from the slaughter of the Amalekites, and David had abode two days in Ziklag;

verses.name: 2 Samuel 1:2
verses.text: It came even to pass on the third day, that, behold, a man came out of the camp from Saul with his clothes rent, and earth upon his head: and so it was, when he came to David, that he fell to the earth, and did obeisance.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 1:3
verses.text: And David said unto him, From whence comest thou? And he said unto him, Out of the camp of Israel am I escaped.
